# Copilot Instructions for Sol Ligam Website

## Architecture & Structure
- **Static site** built with Jekyll, hosted on GitHub Pages.
- Main content pages: `index.html`, `projets.html`, `outils.html`, `a-propos.html`, `contact.html`, `mentions-legales.md`.
- **Reusable layouts** in `_layouts/` (notably `default.html`), and **includes** in `_includes/` (e.g., `header.html`, `footer.html`).
- **SCSS styles** in `_sass/main.scss`, compiled to `assets/css/style.css`.
- **Projects** are managed as a Jekyll collection in `_projects/` (each project as a markdown file).
- **Data files** (e.g., team, values) in `_data/` (YAML format).
- **Images** in `images/` (WebP preferred for eco-design).
- **Service Worker** (`sw.js`) for static asset caching.

## Developer Workflows
- **Local development**: `bundle install` then `bundle exec jekyll serve` (see README for details).
- **Deployment**: Automatic via GitHub Actions on push to `main`. No manual deploy needed.
- **Do not edit** files in `_site/` (auto-generated by Jekyll).
- **SCSS**: Edit only `_sass/main.scss` and import via `assets/css/style.scss`.
- **Navigation**: Controlled in `_config.yml` under `navigation:`.

## Project Conventions & Patterns
- **Eco-conception**: Use system fonts, minimal JS, WebP images, and lazy loading for images (`loading="lazy"`).
- **SEO**: Meta tags and JSON-LD structured data are set in `_layouts/default.html` using Jekyll variables.
- **Accessibility**: Color variables and ARIA attributes are used; check `header.html` and `main.scss` for patterns.
- **Theming**: Light/dark/accessibility themes via CSS variables and toggles in the header.
- **Social/contact links**: Centralized in `_config.yml` and used in includes.
- **No web fonts**: Only system fonts for performance and eco-design.
- **No client-side routing**: All navigation is static.

## Integration Points
- **External links**: Always use `rel="noopener noreferrer"` for security.
- **Carbon simulator**: External tool, URL in `_config.yml` under `company.carbon_simulator`.
- **Social media**: URLs in `_config.yml` under `social:`.

## Examples
- To add a new project: create a markdown file in `_projects/` with front matter (see existing examples).
- To update navigation: edit the `navigation:` array in `_config.yml`.
- To add a new team member: update `_data/a-propos.yml`.
- To change the theme palette: edit CSS variables in `_sass/main.scss`.

## Key Files
- `_layouts/default.html`: Main HTML structure, meta, SEO, JSON-LD, and scripts.
- `_includes/header.html`, `_includes/footer.html`: Navigation, theming, and contact info.
- `_sass/main.scss`: All custom styles and theming.
- `_config.yml`: Site config, navigation, company info, SEO, and social links.
- `sw.js`: Service worker for caching.

---

For more, see the [README.md](../README.md). If you add new conventions, document them here.
